articles.description: Listen to BBC radio commentaries and follow live text updates from five games in the Premier League, followed by coverage of Manchester City taking on Chelsea.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Build up, scores, radio commentary & updates

articles.description: India face England in the second T20 – follow score & text updates.
articles.title: India vs England LIVE: Second T20, Chennai - cricket score & updates

articles.description: American underdog Madison Keys finally gets her hands on a Grand Slam trophy after holding off defending champion Aryna Sabalenka to win the Australian Open.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Madison Keys shocks Aryna Sabalenka in Melbourne final

articles.description: England are still searching for their first win of the Women's Ashes after another dominant Australia win in Adelaide.
articles.title: Women's Ashes 2025: England bowled out for 90 as Australia seal white-ball clean sweep

articles.description: Harry Kane scores as Bayern Munich beat Freiburg to go six points clear at the top of the Bundesliga table.
articles.title: Freiburg 1-2 Bayern Munich: Harry Kane scores as visitors go six points clear

articles.description: Brian Schottenheimer, the son of legendary coach Marty, is appointed head coach of the Dallas Cowboys.
articles.title: NFL: Dallas Cowboys appoint Brian Schottenheimer as head coach

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text coverage of Saturday's SPFL fixtures, headlined by five Premiership games.
articles.title: Saturday's Scottish football - radio & text: BBC Sport

articles.description: Manchester United winger Antony arrived in the summer of 2022 full of promise but he is now on the brink of leaving the club as one of their worst ever signings.
articles.title: Antony: Manchester United's £81m man set for fresh start

articles.description: A year ago Matz Sels was on the verge of a low-key move to Nottingham Forest. Now he is statistically the Premier League's best goalkeeper this season.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest's Matz Sels on his second Premier League chance

articles.description: Follow action from 10 Championship games including three lunchtime kick-offs, with live text commentary and score updates.
articles.title: EFL Championship LIVE: Action from 10 matches - follow text commentary & score updates
